metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19532 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability exists in the function PdfTranslator::setTarget() in pdftranslator.cpp of PoDoFo 0.9.6, while creating the PdfXObject, as demonstrated by podofoimpose. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
